name: @libresat/service
description: A minimal, modular and optionally opinionated library for building [microservices](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microservices) for [microplatforms](https://jaxenter.com/microservices-monorepo-microplatform-137920.html) based on [GraphQL](https://graphql.org/) via [Apollo Server](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/apollo-server/) and [MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/) via [Mongoose](https://mongoosejs.com/)

scripts.watch: nodemon -e ts -x npm run build -w src/ -w node_modules/
scripts.watch:dev: nodemon -e ts -x npm run build:dev -w src/ -w node_modules/
scripts.watch:build: nodemon -e ts -x npm run build -w src/ -w node_modules/
scripts.watch:build:dev: nodemon -e ts -x npm run build:dev -w src/ -w node_modules/

author: Felicitas Pojtinger <felicitas@pojtinger.com>
